name: PLANETS OF WAR (itch)
description:
Game

  • Short Clicking Adventure Game in which you Save Earth from an Alien Invasion.

Story

  • 2096: First Contact with an aggressive extraterrestrial Civilization
  • 2099: 90% of Humanity was destroyed by the Visitors
  • Your Ship is the last hope of Humanity!
  • Your Mission is to Save the Earth and destroy the Aliens and their Home Planet.

The Achievements from the Trailer are only on Steam!

Steam Greenlight Link
